column5: Brittany is the grandest of our rooms, with 15 foot ceilings and beautiful art. It is located on the ground floor of the Great Hall. The room has a queen sized bed, dresser, and private bathroom with a very large walk-in shower, and is individually climate-controlled. This is the only of the three rooms that is wheelchair accessible.  Castle guests receive free admission to the Faire and Celtic Festival if they occur during their stay.  View all our rooms: https://www.airbnb.com/s?host_id=145198
